channel.title: Starting a server
channel.description:
Okay.. so here's the deal.. my Accounts name is Jason.. and i am trying to start a new server once i can get everything in place. I want to know how to get it up and running and how to get everything going. For instance, how do i make a monster drop something, and how do i make sure it drops most of the time. How do i allow specials and magic. Stuff like this is really what i need to know. I'll need all the help i can get. Please help me out on this .. Thank you very much. : :confused: :) [center][img]http://www.moparisthebest.org/smf/Themes/default/images/warnwarn.gif[/img] Moparscape/private server related topics are to be made on the forums at www.moparisthebest.com/smf
Please refrain from posting runescape private server questions here in future.[/center]

item.title: Starting a server
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

jason1:

oops… sory… i forgot about that…so where can i actually talk about this stuff?

There should be a section for moparscape questions or private server help in the link I posted.

Read full topic
